headline: Stock-Split Watch: Is Meta Platforms Next?
summary: Stock splits get a lot of attention from investors, and it's understandable why.  While they don't do anything to fundamentally change the value of the stock, they do lower the share price, which makes the stock more attractive to retail investors.  There's also some evidence that stocks outperform over the year following the stock split, according to research from Bank of America.

raw.headline: Stock-Split Watch: Is Meta Platforms Next?
